required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Whack-a-Mole: Testing an Intervention to Increase Melanoma Identification
clinical_study.official_title: Whack-a-Mole: Testing an Intervention to Increase Melanoma Identification

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate an interactive game designed to increase people's ability to identify cancerous moles.

primary_outcome.description: Mole identification accuracy will be reported as the amount of mole correctly identified as either melanoma or typical nevi

secondary_outcome.description: Self-report measure of intentions to perform a skin self exam. Quantified using a single item indicator with scores ranging from 1-7 with higher scores indicating greater intentions to perform a skin self exam to detect potential melanomas.

Self-report measure of intentions to schedule an appointment with a dermatologist to receive a skin cancer exam. Quantified using a single item indicator with scores ranging from 1-7 with higher scores indicating greater intentions to schedule an appointment with a dermatologist.

Self-report measure of attitudes towards skin cancer exams. Quantified using the mean of the self report scale with scores ranging from 1-7 with higher scores indicating more positive attitudes towards skin self exams.

arm_group.description: Asymmetry, Border, Color, Diameter (ABCD) training message intervention with standard dermatological feedback
ABCD training message intervention with dermatological feedback and a motivational message
ABCD message intervention with no feedback

arm_group.arm_group_label: UDS method training with standard feedback
arm_group.description: Ugly Duckling Sign (UDS) method message intervention with dermatological feedback.

arm_group.arm_group_label: UDS method training with motivational feedback
arm_group.description: UDS message intervention with dermatological feedback and a motivational message.
UDS message intervention with no feedback.

arm_group.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with standard feedback
arm_group.description: Both message interventions with dermatological feedback.

arm_group.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with motivational feedback
arm_group.description: Both message interventions with dermatological feedback and a motivational message.

arm_group.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with no feedback
arm_group.description: Both message interventions with no feedback.

arm_group.arm_group_label: No message intervention with standard feedback
arm_group.description: No message intervention, but with dermatological feedback.

arm_group.arm_group_label: No message intervention with motivational feedback
arm_group.description: No message intervention, but with dermatological feedback and a motivational message.

arm_group.arm_group_label: No message intervention with no feedback
arm_group.description: No message intervention and no feedback. True control.

intervention.description: The intervention condition includes exposure to a message emphasizing the ABCD strategy to identify malignant melanoma.
intervention.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with motivational feedback
ABCD and UDS trainings with no feedback
ABCD and UDS trainings with standard feedback
ABCD training with motivational feedback
ABCD training with no feedback
ABCD training with standard feedback

intervention.description: The intervention condition includes exposure to a message emphasizing the UDS strategy to identify malignant melanoma.
intervention.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with motivational feedback
ABCD and UDS trainings with no feedback
ABCD and UDS trainings with standard feedback
UDS method training with motivational feedback
UDS method training with standard feedback

intervention.description: Feedback on mole identification task provided by a dermatologist.
intervention.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with standard feedback
ABCD training with standard feedback
No message intervention with standard feedback
UDS method training with standard feedback

intervention.description: Feedback on mole identification task provided by a dermatologist plus exposure to a motivational fear appeal message designed to increase skin self exam intentions.
intervention.arm_group_label: ABCD and UDS trainings with motivational feedback
ABCD training with motivational feedback
No message intervention with motivational feedback
UDS method training with motivational feedback

study_pop.textblock: Adults living in U.S. who are members of the online panel.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Resident of U.S.
- At least 18 years old
- Capable of reading English
- Member of panel assembled by survey provider
Exclusion Criteria:
- Individuals under 18 years old
